comments:
Build 20011218

Running the old org.eclipse.jdt.junit.eclipse plugin, I got an NPE when I:
- selected AllTests.java in the Eclipse UI JFace tests
- chose Run... from the Packages view context menu
- chose JUnit Tests as the launcher
- hit Next

Here is the stack dump:

May no longer be an issue in the current code, but it might indicate a problem 
in either the ApplicationWizard or the Packages view's run... method.

Note that I was able to launch this OK from the Run toolbar button, picking the 
same launcher.
obsolete - the old launching code got removed from the system.
